title: Select display for proportions buying smart watch

content.description: Researchers conducted a telephone survey of 427 adults living in a large city. The adults were asked whether they planned to purchase a smart watch in the next year. The table shows the responses categorized by the region of the city in which the residents live.
content.question: Which of the following graphical displays is most appropriate for comparing the proportions of those surveyed who plan to purchase a smart watch within the four regions?

topic.text: 1.4: Representing a Categorical Variable with Graphs

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Compare distributions or relative positions of points within a distribution.
